body_html: Are you trying to be backward compatible for custom initializers (outside of TF repo) that don't understand partition_info? I've faced similar issue, and fixed it to have all custom initializers on my side accept partition_info argument.
body_text: Are you trying to be backward compatible for custom initializers (outside of TF repo) that don't understand partition_info? I've faced similar issue, and fixed it to have all custom initializers on my side accept partition_info argument.
body: Are you trying to be backward compatible for custom initializers (outside of TF repo) that don't understand `partition_info`? I've faced similar issue, and fixed it to have all custom initializers on my side accept `partition_info` argument.
